title: Dangerously Forbidden Love
description: Falling in love was never in the cards for me. I've never had a problem getting a companion for the night. Being the leader of the largest and most powerful mafia in the entire world didn't leave me time for anything else.Unfortunately for me, love doesn't give a damn about schedules or how much free time one has. Love strikes when it wants to, and it does it furiously and without prejudice. For me, love came in the exotically beautiful and completely forbidden Arianna Massena, daughter of a rival mafia.I do everything I can to stay away from her, but when her father starts treating her like dirt and tries setting her up with the son of another mafia, I'm forced to take action. I won't lose my girl to anyone else, and there's no way I'll ever let her be treated like nothing more than property or a bargaining chip.Taking Arianna away from the danger that is her father flips both of our world's upside down. I've never been afraid to do what needs to be done to protect my family, but I didn't dare dream the dangerous lengths I'll need to go to in order to protect the woman I love.Content - Mafia Romance- Cop Romance- Dark Themes- Physical Violence- Age Gap
author: Melony Ann
